hero.title: Turn Your Vision into a Recruitment Asset
hero.description: Through Wantedly, connect with talented professionals who resonate with your company's vision. We help you achieve recruitment success beyond just conditions and budgets.
hero.banner_text: Learn how to leverage our services in your business

talent.title:
4 Million Talented Professionals
Awaiting Companies
That Share Their Values
talent.description: Wantedly attracts users from various fields who seek work based on shared values. Find truly matching talent by communicating your work's purpose and social significance.

vision.title:
Your Company's Vision,
Visible and Resonant.
vision.subtitle:
We provide comprehensive tools
to convey your unique company appeal.

recruitment.title: Unlimited Job Postings
recruitment.description: Post unlimited positions across all job types, from internships to mid-career roles. Our easy-to-use format helps you effectively communicate your company's vision.
recruitment.subtext: New Graduates・Internships / Mid-Career・Side Jobs / All Positions

pricing.subtitle:
No Success Fees.
Keep Your Recruitment Costs Low.
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Wantedly uses a fixed monthly pricing model without success fees, allowing you to optimize your recruitment strategy while keeping costs predictable.

feature.subtitle: Our Expertise
feature.title: We are your "Digital Partner" solving business challenges from the ground up.
feature.description: From AI automation to EC development and modern app creation. We streamline complex operations to dramatically increase sales and customer satisfaction.
feature.description-1:
• Develop custom apps for specific business needs, such as reservation systems and point programs, adding unique features for your company.
• Implement API integration with logistics and inventory management systems to automate order-to-shipping processes, reducing human error and supporting efficient operations.
feature.description-2:
• Utilize platforms like Dify to develop generative AI using company data, creating agents tailored to your operations for routine task automation.
• Integrate existing CRM and ERP systems with generative AI to automate response operations using AI trained on proprietary data.
feature.name-3: Modern Web Development with Latest Technology
feature.description-3:
• Develop high-performance business systems like customer management and operation tools to support operational efficiency.
• Significantly reduce maintenance and management costs through GCP and Firebase-based web development, enabling server management without heavy investment even for small businesses.

cta.title:
Comprehensive Support
From System Development to Operation
cta.description: Our engineers will listen to your business model and propose solutions optimized for your needs.
cta.benefit-1: Custom system development optimized for your business
cta.benefit-2: Reduced operating costs through cloud utilization
cta.benefit-5: Training and education for system operation
cta.benefit-6: Consistent support from development to operation

gridTile.title: Our Services
gridTile.subtitle: Take Your Business to New Heights with AI × Digital Innovation

tile-1.title: AI Solutions
tile-1.subtitle: Automate tasks with AI and focus on what truly matters
tile-1.list-1:
• Automated inquiry response
AI chatbots quickly handle customer questions, reducing staff workload and improving customer satisfaction.
tile-1.list-2:
• High-precision recommendations using data
Analyze purchase history and browsing data to suggest optimal products and plans for each user, increasing repeat rates and sales.
tile-1.list-3:
• Effective use of internal knowledge
Train AI on manuals and FAQs for smooth internal inquiries, reducing new employee training costs.
tile-1.merit-1: • Increased sales and LTV through personalized service
tile-1.merit-2: • Create an environment where staff can focus on core tasks

tile-2.title: EC Site Development & Customization
tile-2.subtitle: Grow your sales 24/7 with an attractive online store
tile-2.list-1:
• Scalable EC development centered on Shopify
Wide range of support from inventory/order automation to brand-aligned design.
tile-2.list-2:
• Business efficiency with Shopify Flow and custom apps
Automate complex tasks like stock notifications and marketing emails. Reduce human error and focus on customer service and marketing.
tile-2.list-3:
• Global expansion and multilingual support
Expand your market reach worldwide at reasonable costs. Seize the opportunity to explore previously unreachable markets.
tile-2.merit-1: • Significant reduction in operating costs & improved customer experience
tile-2.merit-2: • Implement original design and unique features to enhance brand power

tile-3.title: System Development
tile-3.subtitle: Fast and scalable systems that powerfully support business growth
tile-3.list-1: • We propose systems tailored to your needs, including specific operating costs and implementation expenses.
tile-3.list-2: • Using GCP×CloudRun×Firestore configuration for automatic scaling, maintaining stability during high traffic with pay-as-you-go pricing for cost optimization.
tile-3.list-3: • Build a high-performance DB with low initial costs using Firestore. Keep data real-time updated and utilize collected data effectively.

tile-4.title: Website & Web Application Development
tile-4.subtitle: Simultaneously achieve cost reduction, UX improvement, and development optimization
tile-4.list-1: • Significantly improve page load speeds by combining Next.js server-side rendering with FastAPI high-performance backend development.
tile-4.list-2: • Smooth feature additions possible, allowing for development aligned with business growth stages.
tile-4.list-3: • Utilize Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for stable performance even during high traffic, with auto-scaling for optimal resource allocation.

tile-5.title: Global Business Expansion
tile-5.subtitle: Now is the time to expand globally. Seize the opportunity to explore new markets.
tile-5.list-1: • Enable global market access with multilingual EC site development
tile-5.list-2: • Support smooth international expansion through integration with local payment and delivery services
tile-5.list-3: • System design compliant with international regulations and compliance requirements
